body: I can answer that question @happiestsandy . This story is what we call  Type-B NTR. The woman starts off reluctant or outright rejecting the sexual encounter but is forced to do it via blackmail, coercion, drugs, etc. Gradually, she will begin to enjoy it and she will accept or even desire it before the end.  These stories can have or not have the rape tag but will always have the NTR tag
The author name is ishito yuhra not rinfin lmao
Shouldn't we call this rape instead of netorare??
